components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
When attempting to launch the latest version of the RC of Titanium Studio (3.1.2.201307311059 and even the prior version), it freezes at the splash screen.  I first experienced this behavior on an Ubuntu 13.04 64-bit installation, so I thought I'd try it on Windows 32-bit and I am getting the same behavior.  I have tried this with both JDK 1.6 and 1.7 with the same results.  JAVA_HOME is correctly set in the environment variables.

I have also tried 3.1.1 and it works fine in the exact same environment.  If I start with 3.1.1, have it working with no issues and then upgrade to 3.1.2 RC, upon restarting, I get the splash screen freezing behavior.  So, installing 3.1.2 or upgrading from 3.1.1 both give this behavior on fresh VM's of Windows 7 x86 and Ubuntu 13.04 x64.
fields.environment:
In a fresh VMware VM w/Intel Core i7, 4GB RAM, and 16GB drive: 
- Windows 7 sp1 x86 - all updates
- Titanium Studio 3.1.2 Release Candidate (3.1.2.201307311059)
- Java JDK 1.6.0_45
- node.js 0.10.15
- ADT w/SDK Tools 22.0.5, Platform-tools 18.0.1, SDK Build-tools 18.0.1, SDK Platform/Google API 18, SDK Platform/Google API 14, SDK Platform/Google API 10, Android Support Library 18

comments.body:
Please can you re-try with the very latest version of Ti Studio? A related report was recently fixed in the latest release: TISTUD-5166

Thanks!
